# Simulate
## Def func
```{r}

simulate <- function(N, n_feat){
     matrix(sapply(X=1:n_feat,
                   FUN=function(x) MASS::rnegbin(n=N, mu=sample(x=5:10,size=1), theta=sample(x=1:5, size=1))),
               nrow=N, ncol=n_feat)
}

simulate(100,100)
```
